quizzes.title: History Quiz: Home and St. Peters Basilica
quizzes.description: Test your history knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering History, torah, vincis. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Raphael Santi was the original architect of the Chigi Chapel but Gian Bernini finished it, after Raphael became a father.
How  many books are in the Torah?

Did Leonardo Da Vinci design the facade for the church of Santa Bibiana.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Il Putto Dormiente

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hank Greenberg

questions.question: Which of these architects designed St. Peters Basilica in Rome?

options.text: Donato di Niccolò di Betto Bardi

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carlo Marchionni

questions.question: The Temple of Vespasian was begun by Titus after whose death?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his father, Vespasian

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Torah and Prayers
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, torah, non-jews. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these terms is used by Jews to refer to the Old Testament?
One of the most important prayers in Jewish liturgy is the the Shemoneh Esreh (The Eighteen) This prayer, which must be said every day at almost every service, is also known by what other name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Amidah

questions.question: Which of these prayers is traditionally sung before sunset on Yom Kippur, the Jewish Day of Atonement?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kol Nidre

questions.question: The most important religious document for the Jews, Torah, is written in what language?
What is the name of the collection of stories, legends, and allegorical interpretations of the Hebrew Bible Tanach?
The first day of the Jewish New Year, Rosh Hashanah, can only occur on which of these days?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday or Saturday

questions.question: The first female Rabbi, Berlin-born Regina Jonas, was ordained in what year?
Who was the first Jewish player in the United States National Hockey League?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sam Rothschild

questions.question: Jewish American Sidney Franklin was greatly admired by Ernest Hemingway, as he was the first American to become successful in what occupation?
Four Jewish jobs require ordination (or Smeecha). Which of these is not one of them?
When did the Six Day War between Israel and the Arab states of Egypt, Jordan, and Syria begin?
According to Judaism, even non-Jews are morally bound to observe how many laws from the Torah?
In 1825, Jewish American diplomat and journalist Mordecai Manuel Noah tried to found what Jewish institution in the United States?

options.text: A Jewish rebellion organization in the United States
A Jewish homeland in the United States
A Jewish government in the United States
A Jewish independent church in the United States

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Jewish homeland in the United States

questions.question: Mike Epstein, Norm Sherry, Larry Sherry, and Barry Latman were all Jewish baseball players. What do they have in common?

options.text: They all played for the Dodgers.
They all played for the Yankees.
They all went to the same high school.
The were all assassinated for political motives.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They all went to the same high school.
